verses.text: When \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*, the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of all that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add and\add* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;

Then \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Zipporah|strong="H6855"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* he had sent her \w back|strong="H7964"\w*,

And her \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; of which the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*; for he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have been an \w alien|strong="H1616"\w* in a \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:\f + \fr 18.3 \ft Gershom: that is A stranger there\f*

And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*; for the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \add said he, was\add* mine \w help|strong="H5828"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* me from the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*:\f + \fr 18.4 \ft Eliezer: that is, My God is an help\f*

And \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, where he \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* at the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, I thy father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, and thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and her \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with her.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, and did \w obeisance|strong="H7812"\w*, and \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* him; and they \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w each|strong="H0376"\w* \w other|strong="H7453"\w* of \add their\add* \w welfare|strong="H7965"\w*; and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*.\f + \fr 18.7 \ft welfare: Heb. peace\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* and to the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* for \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* \w sake|strong="H0182"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w travail|strong="H8513"\w* that had \w come|strong="H4672"\w* upon them by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \add how\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* them.  +  r 18.8  t come…: Heb. found them *

And \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H2302"\w* for all the \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom he had \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.

And \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who hath \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* you out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, who hath \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.

Now I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* than all \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: for in the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* wherein they dealt \w proudly|strong="H2102"\w* \add he was\add* above them.

And \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* for \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* with \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* to \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* from the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* unto the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

And when \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add is\add* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? why \w sittest|strong="H3427"\w* thou thyself alone, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* by thee from \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* unto \w even|strong="H6153"\w*?

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, Because the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

When they have a \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me; and I \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* between \w one|strong="H0376"\w* and \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, and I do make \add them\add* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and his \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 18.16 \ft one…: Heb. a man and his fellow\f*

And \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* \add is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

Thou wilt \w surely|strong="H5034"\w* wear \w away|strong="H5034"\w*, both thou, and this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add is\add* with thee: for this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* too \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* for thee; thou art not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* it thyself alone.\f + \fr 18.18 \ft Thou wilt…: Heb. Fading thou wilt fade\f*

\w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* now unto my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, I will give thee \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* with thee: Be thou for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w God-ward|strong="H4136"\w*, that thou mayest \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w causes|strong="H1697"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

And thou shalt \w teach|strong="H2094"\w* them \w ordinances|strong="H2706"\w* and \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, and shalt \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* them the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* wherein they must \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*, and the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* that they must \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

Moreover thou shalt \w provide|strong="H2372"\w* out of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w able|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, such as \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w hating|strong="H8130"\w* \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w*; and \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \add such\add* over them, \add to be\add* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, \add and\add* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w fifties|strong="H2572"\w*, and \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w tens|strong="H6235"\w*:

And let them \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* at all \w seasons|strong="H6256"\w*: and it shall be, \add that\add* every \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* they shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, but every \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* they shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*: so shall it be \w easier|strong="H7043"\w* for thyself, and they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \add the burden\add* with thee.

If thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \add so\add*, then thou shalt be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w endure|strong="H5975"\w*, and all this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall also \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to their \w place|strong="H4725"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

So \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* all that he had \w said|strong="H0559"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w able|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* out of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w made|strong="H5414"\w* them \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* over the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w fifties|strong="H2572"\w*, and \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of \w tens|strong="H6235"\w*.

And they \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* at all \w seasons|strong="H6256"\w*: the \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* \w causes|strong="H1697"\w* they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, but every \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* they \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* themselves.
¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* let his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w* \w depart|strong="H7971"\w*; and he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* his way into his own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
